mapper.select: SELECT * FROM product p WHERE p.product_id IN (SELECT km.product_id FROM keyword_mapping km JOIN ( SELECT keyword_id FROM survey_responses WHERE user_no = 4 AND response_date = ( SELECT MAX(response_date) FROM survey_responses WHERE user_no = 4 ) ) sr ON km.keyword_id = sr.keyword_id GROUP BY km.product_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT km.keyword_id) >= 3);

SELECT p.product_id, GROUP_CONCAT(k.keyword_name SEPARATOR ', ') AS keywords FROM product p LEFT JOIN keyword_mapping km ON p.product_id = km.product_id LEFT JOIN keyword k ON km.keyword_id = k.keyword_id GROUP BY p.product_id;
